response.overview: An American soldier who had been killed during the Vietnam War is revived 25 years later by the military as a semi-android, UniSols, a high-tech soldier of the future. After the failure of the initiative to erase all the soldier's memories, he begins to experience flashbacks that are forcing him to recall his past.
response.tagline: Almost human. Almost perfect. Almost under control.
response.title: Universal Soldier

results.name: Universal Soldier - Trailer - Movies! TV Network
